attributes.action: MI5 Officers reporting of latest status of Singapore evil Mr. Hwa Chi Lin, which is one of the foreign diplomacy of Gordon Brown in year 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

We are MI5 officers, due to xx ?? !! situations in the frontline, we lost the proper way of reporting.

This Singapore Hwa Chi Lin had 2 version of him. First is termed as evil (proud) version of him capable of murder of Dr. Tony Tan in Dec 2002 and other activities as recorded by MI5 officers.
2nd Version of Singapore Hwa Chi Lin is termed as righteous (humble) version of him, which we take that as a cover.

We need to report this to Mr. Gordon Brown or "Green Tree Leaf", "Fireball in center forehead", "Golden Light", "Sunlight" Angel officers in MI5.

Singapore country is in dangerous hand if Singapore Mr. Lee Kuan Yew didn't see through the 2 version of Hwa Chi Lin. In the evil (proud) version of Hwa Chi Lin, our wisdom light angel officer see the potential of overthrowing of current Singapore Prime Minister. We do not allow evil Mr. Hwa Chi Lin to be the head for the country. Please informed Mr. Lee Kuan Yew about the threats.

Regards


Angel Officers

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
